# EditorExportPlatformPC

**Inherits:** [EditorExportPlatform](class_editorexportplatform.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorExportPlatformLinuxBSD](class_editorexportplatformlinuxbsd.md), [EditorExportPlatformWindows](class_editorexportplatformwindows.md)

Base class for the desktop platform exporter (Windows and Linux/BSD).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The base class for the desktop platform exporters. These include Windows and Linux/BSD, but not macOS. See the classes inheriting from this one for more details.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
